**Wikipedia summary**:
<p class="mw-empty-elt"><p>The <b>Pacific oyster</b>, <b>Japanese oyster</b>, or <b>Miyagi oyster</b> (<i><b>Magallana gigas</b></i>)  is an oyster native to the Pacific coast of Asia. It has become an introduced species in North America, Australia, Europe, and New Zealand.
